title: Generative AI (GenAI)-Driven Innovation in Professional Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental instructional design theories and digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Case study-based learning process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to integrate GenAI into instructional design processes. Delivered via short modular units through mobile devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of GenAI on instructional design in medical/legal/technical fields based on case studies
Specify application strategies for GenAI at each instructional design stage (analysis/design/development/evaluation)
Recognize accuracy/ethical issues arising from GenAI adoption and propose resolution strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
